children.name: Authors Management
Get Author
Validates that the authors API response contains all expected author details.
Validates that the authors API response code is 400 for an invalid ID and response details are as expected
Validates that the authors API response code is 404 and response details are as expected
Validates that the API handles SQL injection attempts in the author ID parameter correctly.
Get Authors
Validates that the authors API response contains all expected authors and does not have any duplicates.

Validates that the authors API response is handling non existing ID values
Validates that the API handles SQL injection attempts in the author ID parameter correctly.

Delete Author
Validates that the delete author API response deletes an author
Validates that the delete authors API response code is 400 for an invalid ID and response details are as expected
Validates that the authors API response is handling non existing ID values

Books Management
Get Books
Validates that the Books API response contains all expected books and does not have any duplicates.
Get Book
Validates that the books API response contains all expected book details.
Validates that the books API response code is 400 for an invalid ID and response details are as expected
Validates that the books API response code is 404 and response details are as expected
Validates that the API handles SQL injection attempts in the Book ID parameter correctly.
